description: It’s high summer this August on Fire Island and the dog days of the season are well upon the Lucas Men. Some top-ranking all-stars among the Lucas Men have gathered at the Belvedere Guest House for Men on Fire Island and they all have one thing on their collective mind—to fuck each other crazy. Edji Da Silva, Gabriel Phoenix, Max Adonis, Dylan James, Ruslan Angelo, Drake Masters, Max Arion, Manuel Skye, and Robert Law all get together and fuck hardcore. Along with all of the sucking and fucking, there’s also some intense and deep double penetration, adult-toy action, and aerial footage captured via drone!
title: Belvedere Breeding Orgy (Part 01)
